title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 3.3, Phi-4, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama/ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and list models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama/ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, create, and delete models with a simple API.

title: joshpxyne/ollama-cli
summary: Feature-rich interactive CLI for Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting, and model management shortcuts.

title: langchain-ai/langchain-community
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama: use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat component inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui/ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured web UI for Ollama (now Open WebUI) with RAG, multi-user support, and OpenAI-compatible endpoints.

title: mxschmitt/ollama-pnpm
summary: Unofficial TypeScript wrapper exposing typed generate/chat/embed APIs with auto-pulled model helpers.

title: ollama4j/ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and tool-calling support; Maven Central artifact.

title: richawo/ollama-instructor
summary: Lightweight Python package that adds structured-output (Pydantic) instruction mode on top of Ollama chat.

title: pthomas-sherlock/ollama-docker-gpu
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stack for Ollama with GPU (NVIDIA) support and WebUI.

title: ollama-rust/ollama-rs
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and list models with Tokio.

title: nicolas-goudeseune/ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: continuedev/continue
summary: VS Code & JetBrains plugin that adds local LLM coding assistance via Ollama (chat, autocomplete, refactor).

title: joaomdmoura/llama-node
summary: Node.js bindings for llama.cpp with first-class Ollama support; run and chat with models natively.

title: r2d2-linux/ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selector and persistent storage options.

title: ollama-ui/ollama-lab
summary: Experimental Qt desktop GUI for Ollama with conversation management and model switching.

title: sammcj/ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that proxies to Ollama; useful for quick browser-based testing.

title: ollama-tools/ollama-whisper
summary: Small utility that pipes Whisper.cpp transcriptions into Ollama for voice-driven chat.

title: ollama-tools/ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot wrapper around Ollama providing group and private chat access to local models.

title: ollama-tools/ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot that exposes Ollama models via slash commands with per-user rate limits.
